name: Dots Mania - Connect Two Spinny Dots and Brain Circle
name_original: Dots Mania - Connect Two Spinny Dots and Brain Circle
description:
Dots Mania is an addictive puzzle game that you can play anytime and anywhere!

How to play:
1. Fill the bubbles with juice
2. Make rows to get points
3. Challenge your friends!

Features:
*Easy to learn and play
*Colorful design suitable for all ages

Get it & make your record!
